attributes.action: Ban Smoking Drinking Subsidised food in Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
House of Commons and Lords to be made an entirely alcohol free zone.

Both Houses including all outside spaces made strictly non-smoking areas.

Subsidised Restaurants and Café’s brought up to London prices.

Travel allowance only reimbursed at Standard rate any upgrade paid out of own pockets.

Scrap private car mileage allowance to promote use of public transport.

Housing/Accommodation allowances to be capped at £7500 pa.
